I guess the question is:
How do I add a service to the default runlevel in the command line?
E.g. if I want to add sshd to the default runlevel, how do I do that?
THERE IS NO BOX!!!
once an initscript has been set up (in /etc/init.d) use the update-rc.d command
Thanks bimberi!! So update-rc.d foobar defaults would do it?
yep, that's the theory :)
and foobar would start automatically each time it boots up?
yes
